name: English
COMMANDS_PIGS_ADD_DESCRIPTION: Add a user to the graylist.
COMMANDS_PIGS_ADD_SUCCESS_TARGET_IS_BOT: added to the graylist, despite being a bot.
COMMANDS_PIGS_ADD_FAIL_SENDER_IS_PIG: A user from the graylist cannot add users to the graylist.
COMMANDS_PIGS_ADD_FAIL_TARGET_IS_PIG: The user is already in the graylist.
COMMANDS_PIGS_ADD_FAIL_TARGET_IS_CLIENT: You cannot add yourself to the graylist.
COMMANDS_PIGS_ADD_FAIL_TARGET_IS_CREATOR: For such audacious insolence, you have been added to the graylist.
COMMANDS_PIGS_REMOVE_DESCRIPTION: Remove a user from the graylist.
COMMANDS_PIGS_REMOVE_FAIL_SENDER_IS_PIG: A user from the graylist cannot remove users from the graylist.
COMMANDS_PIGS_TARGET_IS_NOT_PIG: The user is not in the graylist.
COMMANDS_PIGS_CREATE_CATEGORY_DESCRIPTIO: Create a category for graylist users.
COMMANDS_PIGS_CREATE_CATEGORY_FAIL_CATEG: A category with the same name already exists.
COMMANDS_PIGS_CATEGORY_IS_NOT_EXIST: The category with that name does not exist.
COMMANDS_PIGS_SET_PIG_CATEGORY_DESCRIPTI: Assign a category to a user.
COMMANDS_PIGS_REMOVE_USER_CATEGORY_DESCR: Remove a category from a user.
COMMANDS_PIGS_ADD_BATTLE_PICTURE_SUCCESS: Battle picture uploaded for the category.
COMMANDS_PIGS_BATTLE_PICTURE_FAIL_NO_PIC: You need to attach an image to the command.
